attributes.action: be re-instate Rugby Union as an Olympic sport in 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that Rugby Union sould be introduced at the 2012 Olympics in London.This seems natural considering football has now got a part in it. It could be played at Twickenham the home of Rugby so no additional cost would be requried for new facilities.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the governing body, the IOC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
